content.prompt: The freight transported on the railways to the ports of Buenos Aires and La Plata most likely consisted largely of

choices.label: Argentinian meat and raw materials for export to Great Britain and Europe
Argentinian precision machinery for export to Great Britain and Europe
Brazilian coffee and rubber for export to Great Britain and Europe
British and European industrial imports arriving in Argentina via Chile

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
